content.question: Jacob Riisâ€™s principal involvement in the reform movements of the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries was his effort to

choices.label: bar obscene materials from the United States mail system
organize the transfer of urban orphans to homes in rural areas
publicize poor housing and sanitation in urban tenements
establish special homes for juvenile delinquents
pass federal laws to end prostitution

content.answer: publicize poor housing and sanitation in urban tenements

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
